segments.text: I'm so excited ! We have two weeks off ! What are you going to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure . I guess I'll just stay at home . Maybe I'll catch up on my reading . What about you ? Any plans ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , my parents have rented a condominium in Florida . I'm going to take long walks along the beach every day and do lots of swimming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Say , why don't you come with us ? We have plenty of room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you mean it ? I'd love to !
segments.speaker: S2
